message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $9000. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $10000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $9500. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9500, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10250. This is the final offer I'm willing to make. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9750. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to accept your final offer of $9750, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
